what: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegArslan
title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegArslan
text: ggseg 2.0 atlas package providing brain atlas data ggseg ecosystem. data-package custom functions.

title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegArslan
text: data/*.rda — Unified ggseg_atlas objects (2D + 3D one object) R/data.R — Roxygen2 documentation atlas R/ggsegArslan-package.R — Package-level docs, imports ggseg.formats R/sysdata.rda — Internal palette data (brain_pals) data-raw/ — Scripts generated/converted atlas data

title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegArslan
text: package depends ggseg.formats provides ggseg_atlas class. atlas objects work ggseg::geom_brain() (2D) ggseg3d::ggseg3d() (3D).

title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegArslan
text: Update docs: devtools::document() Run tests: devtools::test() (testthat edition 3, describe/style) Full check: devtools::check() Build pkgdown site: pkgdown::build_site()

title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegArslan
text: code comments except necessary workarounds Roxygen2 markdown enabled Tests use describe/BDD style vdiffr visual regression NEWS.md tracks user-facing changes (CI/pkgdown changes) URLs point ggseg GitHub org (LCBC-UiO)

what: Arslan Atlas for the ggseg Ecosystem
title: Arslan Atlas for the ggseg Ecosystem
text: package contains dataset plotting arslan atlas ggseg ggseg3d. Arslan, S., & Rueckert, D. (2015, October). Multi-level parcellation cerebral cortex using resting-state fMRI. International Conference Medical Image Computing Computer-Assisted Intervention (pp. 47-54). Springer, Cham. SpringerLink learn use atlases, please look documentation ggseg ggseg3d

title: Arslan Atlas for the ggseg Ecosystem
text: recommend installing ggseg-atlases ggseg r-universe: can install released version ggsegArslan GitHub :   Please note ‘ggsegArslan’ project released Contributor Code Conduct. contributing project, agree abide terms.
code: # Enable this universe options(repos = c(     ggseg = 'https://ggseg.r-universe.dev',     CRAN = 'https://cloud.r-project.org'))  # Install some packages install.packages('ggsegArslan') # install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("ggseg/ggsegArslan") library(ggseg) #> Warning: package 'ggseg' was built under R version 4.1.1 #> Loading required package: ggplot2 library(ggseg3d) library(ggsegArslan)  plot(arslan) +   theme(legend.position = "bottom",          legend.text = element_text(size = 9)) +   guides(fill = guide_legend(ncol = 6)) library(dplyr) ggseg3d(atlas = arslan_3d) %>%    add_glassbrain() %>%    pan_camera("right lateral")

title: Arslan Multi-Level Parcellation Atlas — arslan
text: Brain atlas Arslan multi-level parcellation cerebral cortex using resting-state fMRI 50 regions. Contains 2D polygon geometry ggseg::geom_brain() 3D vertex indices ggseg3d::ggseg3d().

title: Arslan Multi-Level Parcellation Atlas — arslan
text: Arslan, S., & Rueckert, D. (2015, October). Multi-level parcellation cerebral cortex using resting-state fMRI. International Conference Medical Image Computing Computer-Assisted Intervention (pp. 47-54). Springer, Cham. doi:10.1007/978-3-319-24574-4_6

title: Arslan Multi-Level Parcellation Atlas — arslan
code: arslan() #>  #> ── arslan ggseg atlas ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> Type: cortical #> Regions: 25 #> Hemispheres: left, right #> Views: lateral, medial #> Palette: ✔ #> Rendering: ✔ ggseg #> ✔ ggseg3d (vertices) #> ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> # A tibble: 50 × 3 #>    hemi  region label           #>    <chr> <chr>  <chr>           #>  1 left  1      lh_LH_region_1  #>  2 left  2      lh_LH_region_2  #>  3 left  3      lh_LH_region_3  #>  4 left  4      lh_LH_region_4  #>  5 left  5      lh_LH_region_5  #>  6 left  6      lh_LH_region_6  #>  7 left  7      lh_LH_region_7  #>  8 left  8      lh_LH_region_8  #>  9 left  9      lh_LH_region_9  #> 10 left  11     lh_LH_region_11 #> 11 left  12     lh_LH_region_12 #> 12 left  13     lh_LH_region_13 #> 13 left  14     lh_LH_region_14 #> 14 left  16     lh_LH_region_16 #> 15 left  17     lh_LH_region_17 #> 16 left  18     lh_LH_region_18 #> 17 left  19     lh_LH_region_19 #> 18 left  20     lh_LH_region_20 #> 19 left  21     lh_LH_region_21 #> 20 left  22     lh_LH_region_22 #> 21 left  23     lh_LH_region_23 #> 22 left  24     lh_LH_region_24 #> 23 left  10     lh_LH_region_10 #> 24 left  15     lh_LH_region_15 #> 25 left  25     lh_LH_region_25 #> 26 right 1      rh_RH_region_1  #> 27 right 6      rh_RH_region_6  #> 28 right 8      rh_RH_region_8  #> 29 right 9      rh_RH_region_9  #> 30 right 10     rh_RH_region_10 #> 31 right 13     rh_RH_region_13 #> 32 right 14     rh_RH_region_14 #> 33 right 15     rh_RH_region_15 #> 34 right 16     rh_RH_region_16 #> 35 right 20     rh_RH_region_20 #> 36 right 22     rh_RH_region_22 #> 37 right 23     rh_RH_region_23 #> 38 right 2      rh_RH_region_2  #> 39 right 3      rh_RH_region_3  #> 40 right 4      rh_RH_region_4  #> 41 right 5      rh_RH_region_5  #> 42 right 7      rh_RH_region_7  #> 43 right 11     rh_RH_region_11 #> 44 right 12     rh_RH_region_12 #> 45 right 17     rh_RH_region_17 #> 46 right 18     rh_RH_region_18 #> 47 right 19     rh_RH_region_19 #> 48 right 21     rh_RH_region_21 #> 49 right 24     rh_RH_region_24 #> 50 right 25     rh_RH_region_25

what: ggsegArslan: Arslan Atlas for the 'ggseg' Ecosystem — ggsegArslan-package
title: ggsegArslan: Arslan Atlas for the 'ggseg' Ecosystem — ggsegArslan-package
text: Arslan multi-level parcellation atlas 'ggseg' ecosystem. Provides unified 'ggseg_atlas' object 2D polygon geometry 3D vertex indices, use 'ggseg' 'ggseg3d'.

title: ggsegArslan: Arslan Atlas for the 'ggseg' Ecosystem — ggsegArslan-package
ggsegArslan 2.0.0
text: arslan now ggseg_atlas object (ggseg.formats) containing 2D 3D data. separate arslan_3d object removed. Use ggplot() + ggseg::geom_brain(atlas = arslan) 2D plots ggseg3d::ggseg3d(atlas = arslan) 3D plots — object. ggseg.formats now hard dependency (Depends). Package URLs updated LCBC-UiO ggseg GitHub organisation.
